author: jtraglia
content: Hey consensus devs, we just published the [v1.6.0-beta.0](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.6.0-beta.0) release! For Phase0 there are some new helper functions for getting slot component times which will be useful in Gloas. There are many updates/improvements for Gloas; epbs-devnet-0 will be based on this release. And initial specifications for EIP-8025 (Optional Execution Proofs) from <@427491045308235776> which is exciting.
